code: import*as actionTypes from"../constants/cartConstants";const CART_INITIAL_STATE={cartItems:[]};export const cartReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:CART_INITIAL_STATE;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART:const item=action.payload;const existItem=state.cartItems.find(x=>x.product===item.product);if(existItem){return{...state,cartItems:state.cartItems.map(x=>x.product===existItem.product?item:x)};}else{return{...state,cartItems:[...state.cartItems,item]};}case actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_CART:return{...state,cartItems:state.cartItems.filter(x=>x.product!==action.payload)};default:return state;}};
